snippet: The naming of Flowers as the initial bidder will begin the first auction of brands by Hostess, which filed for liquidation in late November after struggling with nearly $1 billion in debt and labor costs it called onerous.
abstract: The naming of Flowers as the initial bidder will begin the first auction of brands by Hostess, which filed for liquidation in late November after struggling with nearly $1 billion in debt and labor costs it called onerous.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Hostess Names Flowers as Lead Bidder for Bread Brands
